scripts.deploy-dev: graph deploy marlin-staging/staking-arb1-dev subgraph-arb1-dev.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token

scripts.deploy-staging: graph deploy --product hosted-service marlin-staging/staking-arb1 --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy-staging-cluster-selection: graph deploy --product hosted-service marlin-staging/staking-cluster-selection subgraph-clusterSelection.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy-staging-receiver-tickets: graph deploy --product hosted-service marlin-staging/staking-receiver-tickets subgraph-receiverTickets.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
